bike.description: M5 manipulated alloy w/ ORE TT/DT, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 140mm travel

components.description: Specialized/Fox Brain Shock w/ remote Trail Tune inertia valve, Brain Fade and rebound adj., 7.75x1.9", integrated cartridge bearing shock mount
1 1/8" upper and lower campy style cartridge bearings for integrated alloy HT
Thomson Elite Setback w/ 12 degree clamp, S/M: 367mm L/XL:410mm
34.9mm clamp ID, 7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
